meanings.definition: The act of cleaning before the main cleaning process.
meanings.sent1: Before the big cleaning, the precleaning made sure everything was ready.
meanings.sent2: I always do a precleaning before the deep clean to save time.
meanings.sent3: The precleaning dance party was a fun way to get ready for the real cleaning.
meanings.sent4: Her precleaning was like a warm-up before the intense workout of cleaning.
meanings.sent5: The precleaning was like a dress rehearsal for the main cleaning event.

meanings.definition: To clean before the main cleaning process.
meanings.sent1: She precleaned the dishes before putting them in the dishwasher.
meanings.sent2: Remember to preclean the surface before applying the new paint.
meanings.sent3: He precleaned the car by giving it a quick wash with the hose.
meanings.sent4: Precleaning the windows made the whole house look brighter instantly.
meanings.sent5: Precleaning the tools before using them ensures they last longer.
